titleInfo.title: COUNTERING IRAN'S DESTABILIZING ACTIVITIES ACT OF 2017

extension.searchTitle: COUNTERING IRAN'S DESTABILIZING ACTIVITIES ACT OF 2017; Congressional Record Vol. 163, No. 101

congVote.result: The amendment (No. 232), as modified, was agreed to.
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: Senate continued consideration of S. 722, to impose sanctions with respect to Iran in relation to Iran's ballistic missile program, support for acts of international terrorism, and violations of human rights, taking action on the following amendments proposed thereto:<P/>By 97 yeas to 2 nay (Vote No. 144), McConnell (for Crapo) Modified Amendment No. 232, to impose sanctions with respect to the Russian Federation and to combat terrorism and illicit financing.
